title: The Betrayal of Trust
summary_paragraph: Edward Scissorhands is captured by vampire guards, but Emily rescues him from a dungeon cell and helps plan a daring rescue mission for Lila. They successfully infiltrate the castle using a secret entrance and free Lila, but Caspian is still at large.

settings.name: the castle
settings.description: a fortress with winding corridors and secret entrances, home to vampire guards and Caspian

settings.name: the dungeon cell
settings.description: a dingy underground room where Edward is held captive after being captured by the vampires

characters.name: Edward Scissorhands
characters.description: the protagonist, a half-human with scissored hands who seeks to defeat Caspian and free Lila; he is determined and brave but also struggles with feelings of guilt and anger

characters.name: Lila
characters.description: a human who has been captured by the vampires; she is resourceful and determined, but also haunted by her experiences in captivity

characters.name: Emily
characters.description: a human who helps Edward and his friends plan a rescue mission for Lila; she is clever and resourceful, with a talent for gathering information and planning strategies

characters.name: Jasper
characters.description: one of Edward's friends, who helps him in the battle against the vampires; he is brave and loyal, but also has his own ideas about how to defeat Caspian
